short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto selects search input for repeated barcode scan searching.  Currently supports: Amazon, eBay, Abebooks and Bookfinder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps automate using a barcode scanner with supported books and shopping websites.  Instead of having to select or click the search field before scanning, this extension does it for you.  It also selects or focuses the search field for subsequent scanning for a keyboard-free experience.

Supported Websites:
-Amazon
-eBay
-Abebooks
-Bookfinder
